EmbeddedServiceMenuItem.name: EmbeddedServiceMenuItem
EmbeddedServiceMenuItem.description: Represents the information needed to configure a Channel Menu item.

ChannelId.description: The unique ID of an EmbeddedServiceConfig (the Embedded Service deployment) if ChannelType is one of the following. Otherwise, this field is null. EmbeddedServiceConfig MessagingChannel

ChannelType.description: The channel the customer uses to contact your business. The possible values are: CustomURL EmbeddedServiceConfig MessagingChannel Phone

CustomUrl.description: The custom URL of the menu item if ChannelType is CustomURL. Otherwise, this field is null.

DisplayOrder.description: The order that the menu items are displayed in the UI. Only positive values are supported.

EmbeddedServiceMenuId.description: Required. The unique ID of the parent record EmbeddedServiceMenuSettings.

IconUrl.description: The URL of the icon used for the menu item.

IsDisplayedOnPageLoad.description: Specifies whether the menu item is dynamically displayed (true) or hidden (false) during runtime. The default value is false.

ItemName.description: The unique name used on the Setup for admins to identify the Channel Menu item. Conforms to the same properties as a developer name.

OsOptionsHideInIOS.description: Specifies whether to hide the menu item on iOS platforms (true) or not (false).

OsOptionsHideInLinuxOS.description: Specifies whether to hide the menu item on Linux platforms (true) or not (false).

OsOptionsHideInMacOS.description: Specifies whether to hide the menu item on macOS platforms (true) or not (false).

OsOptionsHideInOtherOS.description: Specifies whether to hide the menu item on any other platforms not mentioned here (true) or not (false).

OsOptionsHideInWindowsOS.description: Specifies whether to hide the menu item on Windows platforms (true) or not (false).

PhoneNumber.description: The phone number of menu items with ChannelType value Phone. Otherwise, the value is null.

ShouldOpenUrlInSameTab.description: Specifies whether a URL is opened in the same tab (true) or not (false). This field only applies for menu items with ChannelType value CustomURL.
